title: Seven Billion and Counting
subtle:
Informational (nonfiction), 2,801 words, Level Z2 (Grade 5+), Lexile 1030L            
                        
		Multilevel Book also available in levels                     Y and Z1
description: Today, seven billion people live on Earth! This large population is affecting our planet in many ways. How many people do you think is too many for Earth to support? Seven Billion and Counting provides students a comprehensive look at the problems of overpopulation and the impact it has on Earth. This book can also be used to teach students how to analyze cause-and- effect relationships and the proper use of complex sentences. ￼The books and lesson are available for levels Y and Z1.
